thread.section_title: PACK & SEND Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PACK & SEND Australia | www.packsend.com.au
thread.title: kc
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by kc

author: kc
title: kc
text: I sent a parcel to Germany recently (gift, under 30kg), part of the Pack & Send's online service include pick up for delivery, which certainly helps when you are too busy to leave the office. The delivery person came on the day scheduled, no issues. Parcel has been delivered, no issues. Great efficiency.
